pinModal.title: E2EE PIN Hash
pinModal.infoText: This is the PIN hash encrypted with bcrypt. The original PIN cannot be decrypted from this hash. This hash is used for authentication when the user enters their PIN.
pinModal.warningText: Do not share this hash with users. If you need to reset the PIN, use the PIN reset function in the system.
